oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Guard Mount, Fort Oglethorpe, Chickamauga, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color tinted photograph of a military band standing with their instruments on a road in Fort Oglethorpe. Behind them are buildings that resemble houses. Features a white border and divided back. Note: the postcard reads "Chickamauga, Tenn." however Fort Oglethorpe is located in Walker County, Georgia. [No. 11370]
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park (Ga. And Tenn.); Chickamauga Battlefield (Ga.); Fort Oglethorpe (Ga.); Walker County (Ga.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: National parks & reserves; Military bands
